seo.title: How to Reach Hostel Brikette from Positano Ferry Pier – Complete Step-by-Step Guide
seo.description: Arrive stress-free: walk, ride the Interno Positano bus, and follow our luggage tips to get from Positano’s ferry dock to Hostel Brikette in under 15 minutes. Includes live Google Maps links, ticket info and accessibility advice.

linkLabel: How to Reach Hostel Brikette from Positano Ferry Pier – Complete Step-by-Step Guide

sections.title: Positano Port → Hostel via the Interno Bus
body: **Tip 1:** %URL:https://forum.amalfi.com/t/mobility-amalfi-coast-bus-positano-nocelle-praiano/26|Interno Bus timetable & ticket prices%. **Tip 2:** Buy tickets at any *Tabacchi* / newsagent. **Tip 3:** Travelling with luggage? Porters at the pier will deliver bags directly to the hostel.

sections.title: Port to Piazza Dei Mulini
body: Follow %URL:https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Positano+Spiaggia/2+Viale+Pasitea+Positano,+Campania/@40.6289096,14.4857482,18z/data=!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b976916d1a44d:0xf1e08d61658b4291!2m2!1d14.4878892!2d40.6276549!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b976f39841bc9:0x5425cf574fd9d282!2m2!1d14.4857716!2d40.6301562!3e2|these walking directions% from the Main Beach to Piazza Dei Mulini.

sections.title: Piazza Dei Mulini → Local Bus Stop
body:
* Skip the stairs – hop on the Interno bus.
* The service runs every 30 min from ~8 am – midnight.
* View the route on %URL:https://www.google.com/maps/dir/2+Viale+Pasitea+Positano,+Campania/Viale+Pasitea,+323,+84017+Positano+SA/@40.6309188,14.4819138,16z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b976f39841bc9:0x5425cf574fd9d282!2m2!1d14.4857716!2d40.6301562!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b97667312711d:0xa2b15bca59b377fa!2m2!1d14.4824389!2d40.6293416!3e0|Google Maps%.

sections.title: What Does the Bus Look Like?
body: Several vehicle types exist, but the LED sign always reads *“Interno Positano”*.

sections.title: Local Bus Stop → Hostel
body:
* The bus stops outside the Tabacchi pictured below.
* Exit, turn **right**, and walk to the main road.
* Turn **left**; continue ≈100 m / 330 ft.
* The hostel is on your right – climb the stairs to reception.
* Need turn-by-turn? %URL:https://www.google.com/maps/dir/Brikette+Hostel,+Via+G.+Marconi,+358,+84017+Positano+SA/Tabacchi+Cafiero+Emanuele,+Viale+Pasitea,+325a,+84017+Positano+SA/@40.6292434,14.4813669,19z/data=!4m14!4m13!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b97669dd0003b:0xf11f22a59b1b00da!2m2!1d14.480818!2d40.629634!1m5!1m1!1s0x133b97660ef186c1:0xc9eb9ab54d880307!2m2!1d14.4823321!2d40.6293865!3e2|Open Google Maps%.

sections.title: Tip: Approaching the Hostel
body:
* As you near the hostel you’ll see our sign by the second-floor terrace.
* Walk past the sign, follow the bend, and take the stairs on the right to reception.
